passage_text: Employee wages usually aren’t stated directly in a sales associate job description, but we’ve got you covered. The average sales associate salary is $12.08 an hour. The average annual wage is $25,130. The middle 50% of workers’ earnings range from $8.72 to $13.36 an hour, with the highest 10% earning over $18.51.

Sales Associate Salary. (United States). A Sales Associate earns an average wage of $9.25 per hour. Experience has a moderate effect on salary for this job. People in this job generally don't have more than 20 years' experience.

Sales Associate Salary. Sales Associate average salary is $71,301, median salary is $60,000 with a salary range from $20,800 to $225,000. Sales Associate salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position. Sales Associate salary statistics is not exclusive and is for reference only.

The average salary for retail store associate microsoft jobs is $41,000. Average retail store associate microsoft salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits.
